section.name: Ant Tasks
section.p:
Currently WOProject supports the following Ant tasks (for more information about Ant, go to Jakarta Ant Site):
[New] WOApplication: Allows you to build WebObjects applications without using ProjectBuilder.
WOFramework: Allows you to build WebObjects frameworks without using ProjectBuilder.
WOGen: Generates and maintains EOEnterprsieObjects based on EOModel. Ant-based analog of EOGenerator.

When these tasks are called from user buildfiles, Ant would need access to two ".jar" files from WOProject distribution:
[WOProject_installdir]/lib/woproject.jar (needed for all tasks)
[WOProject_installdir]/lib/cayenne.jar (needed for WOGen task only)

section.name: Localization Issues
section.p: WOApplication and WOFramework tasks are dealing with resources (for instance WOComponents, images, etc.). Resources of the applications that have a multilingual audience require localization. For the discussion of how localized resources are handled by WOProject, follow this link.
